description: After 20 years, the hit musical MAMMA MIA! returned to its German origins in Hamburg in the summer of 2022. With 22 rousing superhits by ABBA such as Dancing Queen, Take a chance on me and, of course, Mamma Mia, the celebrated original tells a summery, witty and loving story about Donna and her daughter Sophie. The result was a furious musical theater delight full of feelings of happiness that even caught the attention of Hollywood. The screen version with stars like Meryl Streep and Pierce Brosnan also won over an audience of millions.
name: MAMMA MIA! Hamburg
